observation: I can see a residence selection page with 'Select your residence' heading. There's a country/region dropdown that shows 'Select' as placeholder text. The dropdown has an arrow icon indicating it can be opened. I can see there are many country options available in the elements list (Afghanistan, Aland Islands, Albania, etc.), and notably Indonesia is visible at element 183. I need to first open the dropdown to select a country.
reasoning: As an elderly user, I need to select my country of residence before proceeding. The dropdown currently shows 'Select' placeholder text, so I need to tap on it to open the list of countries. The dropdown element (45) is clearly visible and has good size for my needs.
ux_issues: Font size appears adequate at 14px for the input field
Good contrast with the placeholder text visible

dual_diagnosis.visual_observation: The dropdown input field was successfully tapped and opened a modal/overlay showing a searchable list of countries/regions. The interface changed from showing a closed dropdown with 'Select' placeholder text to displaying an expanded list with countries like Guinea-Bissau, Guyana, Haiti, Honduras, Hungary, Iceland, India, Indonesia, Iraq, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Jamaica, Japan, Kazakhstan, etc. A search field is also visible at the top of the list.
